text: وَهُدُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَهُدُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ

translation.en.sahih: And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan mereka diberi petunjuk kepada ucapan-ucapan yang baik dan ditunjuki (pula) kepada jalan (Allah) yang terpuji.
